spoken: pmd: yo check this out man were gonna do this man. we got 2 minutes and 20 seconds to get in and out of there. yo redman solo man dont get in there and start frontin man. hit the vault get the cash dont shoot *nobody*. alright erick: tom set the detonators.
aw shit. yo redman keep the money movin...yo tom j if i aint out in 10 seconds blow this mothafucker up and everybody yhear me
